label: ProcessWorkItem
comment: A distinct operation or task that is part of a process.

datatypeProperties.comment: A code specifying an alternative classification for this basic work item.
A textual description for the type of transportation waste recovery disposal process.
A code specifying a primary classification value for this work item quantity analysis.
A code specifying a type of MDH health indication.

objectProperties.comment: The total quantity for this basic work item.

referencedBy.comment: A work item performed for this production process.
